Amalfi Apartments in Las Vegas, NV
Conveniently located at the intersection of Highway 15 and Blue Diamond Rd, Amalfi’s bright floor plans and picturesque community create an ideal setting for easy living.
Las Vegas is a straight-shot, 15-minute drive away, and a sprawling expanse of state parks & mountains beckon from just half an hour west.
Residents here enjoy access to everything the city has to offer, comfortably set in the center of it all.
Blissful comfort and serene sophistication compose an everyday paradise— the signature Amalfi experience.

Browse our photo galleries and video tours here, and let us introduce you to gourmet kitchens, the resort-style pool and spa, expansive dog park, and all the premium features that await you in Las Vegas.
Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $45, Deposit $150
Comments: Pets are welcome but limited to two per unit.
Please note that residents will be required to pay a $350 initial pet fee.
Additionally, monthly rent increases by $45 for those with pets.
